items.question: What is TikTok Video Analyzer?
items.answer: TikTok Video Analyzer is an AI-powered platform that helps you analyze TikTok videos, understand trends, and get insights to improve your content strategy.

items.question: How does the analysis work?
items.answer: Simply paste a TikTok video URL and our AI will analyze the video content, extract performance metrics, and provide actionable insights within seconds.

items.question: Is it free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Basic video analysis is free for all users. Premium features may require a subscription in the future.

items.question: Can I export the analysis results?
items.answer: Yes, you can export analysis results to various formats including Feishu documents for easy sharing and collaboration.

items.question: What data do you collect?
items.answer: We only collect publicly available video information for analysis. We do not store personal data or require TikTok account access.
